name: ANSiTURE

description: A simple Breakout clone.

name: Bombs
description: Simple mobile game. You need to touch bombs to diffuse them.

description: Bomberman clone in a fantasy universe.

name: Kraken-Rampage
description: Ludum Dare 33 entry made in 48 hours.

name: Libre Pinball
description: A pinball game.

name: Minilens
description: Free puzzle platform game.

name: Mountain of Hope
description: Game made on Theater Game Jam (PGA 2015)

name: Ninja-Training
description: Small running game done as 1 hour challenge.

name: No hope
description: Ludum Dare 33 entry made in 48 hours.

name: Planet Rider
description: 2D physics parkour game in an alien environment.

name: Ringed
description: Top-down shooter with extensive usage of light effects.

name: Tanks of Freedom
description: Free turn-based isometric strategy game.

name: Veraball
description: Free "roll the ball" game. Collect coins and reach the finish, without falling out of the level.

name: FPS Test
description: A singleplayer FPS test. Physics work, but there are no enemies and no proper shooting.

name: HTTP Server
description: A HTTP 1.0 file server.

name: Pathfinding 2d
description: A demo project demonstrating pathfinding using a tilemap.

name: UDP Snapshot interpolation
description: Lets you connect to a server and view networked physics.

name: UDP State synchronization
description: A more efficient networking demo than the snapshot interpolation one.

name: Iso Dark Theme
description: A clean, modern dark theme.

name: Gdnet
description: An ENet wrapper for Godot.

name: RawPacker
description: Simple binary packing/unpacking for RawArray.

name: Add Primitives
description: Add cylinders, spheres, cubes easily.

name: Color Picker
description: A color picker integrated into Godot.

name: Create Tileset
description: Plugin to generate Godot tilesets based on atlas images

name: Example Model Importer
description: A script that imports models with inverted normals (proof of concept).

name: GodotNotificationCenter
description: A notification center for Godot.

name: Grass Plugin
description: A plugin to handle huge amount of grass, foliages and other vegetations

name: GUT
description: Utility for writing unit tests in GDScript.

name: Heightmap
description: Make an heightmap into terrain.

name: OpenClipArt Store
description: Lets you integrate OpenClipArt assets easily, with a browser.

name: Polygon Merge
description: Merge polygons.

name: Resolution Switcher
description: Switch resolutions easily, for testing.

name: Simplex 2D/3D
description: Simplex deterministic noise functions.

name: SUTjoystick
description: Easy gamepad support for GNU/Linux and Windows.

name: Tiled importer
description: Import maps from Tiled.

name: Tileset Builder
description: Build tilesets.

name: godot.sh
description: Script that automatically downloads and launches latest version of Godot, or compiles and launches git master branch.

name: godot-wrapper
description: Script that helps Debian and Ubuntu users install and use Godot.

name: replicate-file.sh
description: Script to update copies of a file with one master file.

name: strip-to-frames.pl
description: Perl script to split a grid spritesheet image into numbered individual frame files.

name: update-git.sh
description: Updates all Git repositories contained in a directory.
